title: CLAUDE.md documents enhancement capture and interaction logging
description: Verify that CLAUDE.md includes rules for logging 3rd party interactions and capturing enhancement ideas

steps.action: Check CLAUDE.md for interaction logging rule
steps.expected: Rule states: log 3rd party interactions to memory (who, what discussed, what shared)

steps.action: Check CLAUDE.md for enhancement capture rule
steps.expected: Rule states: create a to-do when a 3rd party interaction reveals improvement opportunities

result: Both steps passed. Interaction Logging section documents who/what/shared logging to memory. Enhancement Capture section documents to-do creation for improvement ideas.
